articles.content: SANTA CRUZ, Calif. - No. 11 Oregon became the first team this season to take a lead into halftime against No. 1 Stanford, but the Cardinal used a big third quarter to win, 70-63, on Friday afternoon … [+3497 chars]

articles.title: Al Michaels is Missing $86,000 From His Bank Account Because of Tom Brady - Sportscasting
